alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 13 at 10:10PM EDT until August 13 at 11:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Panhandle Florida, including the following counties, Calhoun and Jackson. * WHEN...Until 1115 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 910 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Blountstown, Altha, Henderson Mill, Chipola, Alliance, Macedonia, Blountstown Airport, Willis, Sink Creek, Chason, Selman, Union City, Durham, Red Oak, Ocheesee and White Pond. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
